Title: Pumpkinhead
Writer: Ed Justin (poem), Mark Patrick Carducci (story), Stan Winston (story), Richard Weinman (story), Mark Patrick Carducci (screenplay), Gary Gerani (screenplay)
Actors: Lance Henriksen, Jeff East, John D'Aquino, Kimberly Ross
Plot: After a group of bikers accidentally murder a young boy named Billy Harley his father Ed harley is devastated and the only thing he wants is revenge and goes to an old woman who is said to be a witch and conjures a demonic creature known as pumpkin head and with Revenge on his Mind unleashes him upon the bikers.
